section.title: Icons list available in OFBIz
section.para: Icons are useful to make the user interface nicer.
To ensure consistency in the application, a logical name was given to each icon and it is advisable to use it.
To be able to change icon sets based on themes, it is advisable not access online the image file but to go through the appropriate properties files.

section.title: How to used icon in a link or show-portlet
section.para:
Below is a "Details" icon usage example
<show-portlet portlet-id="ShowExample" image-location="${iconsPurpose.Details}" image-title="${uiLabelMap.IconsTooltips_Details}">
In this page it is stated in the first column: the logical name of the icon (in the example above Details).
Second column is indicated, which will be displayed as an "image-title" So when the mouse is over the icon, or in some case what is good practice to use.
If you leave the mouse on the image of the icon you have the default "image-title".
